description:
We are looking for a junior software developer to join an ongoing project. The job assumes working in a large investment bank in an international team operating in a global environment collaborating closely with other teams in UK, US and other countries. Fast career growth, foreign business trips, the opportunity to participate in a large multi-year development programme focused on the renovation of the applications responsible for the reporting of financial risks and profit&losses are the key benefits of this position.


Minimal requirements:

  • Basic knowledge of any of the following programming languages(any): Java, C#
  • Basic SQL knowledge
  • Good English skills (ability to read technical documentation, write code documentation and reports)

 

Preferred requirements:

  • Experience of working as a junior developer
  • Experience in task and bug tracking and source code versioning using appropriate systems (like JIRA + SVN, Git, …)
  • Good spoken English
  • Knowledge of some scripting language (Python, Groovy) or Unix shell and SSH will be an advantage

Conditions:

  • The position assumes full time job in the company office
  • We provide a set of training courses within trial period
  • The salary depends on work experience, interview and tests results
name: Junior Developer / Программист
